mapper.select: SELECT sa.id AS sa_id, sa.*, sv.id AS sv_id, sv.*, ssv.sku_id, IF(ssv.sku_id,1,0) as isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.sale_attr_id = sv.sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id = sv.spu_id AND sa.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value ssv ON sa.sale_attr_id = ssv.sale_attr_id AND sv.sale_attr_id = ssv.sale_attr_id AND sv.id = ssv.sale_attr_value_id and ssv.sku_id = #{skuId}
SELECT skv.* FROM sku_sale_attr_value skv INNER JOIN sku_info sk ON skv.sku_id =sk.id where sk.spu_id=#{spuId} ORDER BY skv.sku_id , skv.sale_attr_id
